
```{r}
tryCatch(plot_timeseries(
csv_tv  = "https://github.com/mhepner90/RVC/blob/master/trophic_groups/biomass/opportunists_fk_bio.csv",
title   = "Opportunists biomass",
y_label = "biomass",
skip    = 0,
filter  = NULL,
col_t   = "year",
col_y   = "biomass"),
error = function(e) e)
```
